author: Daniel Greene
description:
The Wheel of Time show is officially canceled at Amazon Prime, and while many fans saw it coming, it still stings. In this episode—Wheel of Time Autopsy—I break down everything that went wrong, from behind-the-scenes struggles to creative missteps, and how a franchise with such massive potential got taken off life support.

This isn’t just a rant—it’s an investigation. What worked in Season 1? What failed in Seasons 2 and 3? Was the fandom fractured beyond repair? Let’s talk about it.
